ValidationRule.description: When the Ticket Status is "Closed", you can't edit the Ticket.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'PS_Partner_Support', AND( NOT($Profile.Name = "System Administrator"), NOT($Profile.Name = "Data Loader Profile") ), NOT ( ISNEW () ), OR( ISPICKVAL ( PRIORVALUE ( Status ) , "Closed" ), ISPICKVAL ( PRIORVALUE ( Status ) , "Rejected" ), ISPICKVAL ( PRIORVALUE ( Status ) , "Invalid" ) ), OR ( ISCHANGED ( Subject ) , ISCHANGED ( Description ) , ISCHANGED ( Issue_Reported_By__c ) , ISCHANGED ( Status ) , ISCHANGED ( Priority ) , ISCHANGED ( SuppliedName ) , ISCHANGED ( SuppliedEmail ) , ISCHANGED ( ParentId ) , ISCHANGED ( OwnerId ) , ISCHANGED ( SuppliedPhone ) , ISCHANGED ( Origin ) , ISCHANGED ( PS_Requester_Type__c ) , ISCHANGED ( AccountId ) , ISCHANGED ( Country__c ) , ISCHANGED ( Reference_Number__c ) , ISCHANGED ( Type ) , ISCHANGED ( Category__c ) , ISCHANGED ( GSS_SPOC_contact__c ) , ISCHANGED ( Type_of_Request__c ) , ISCHANGED ( Priority ), ISCHANGED ( PS_Communication_Language__c ) , ISCHANGED ( PS_Email_to_GS_L1__c ) , ISCHANGED ( PS_Escalated_To_Email__c ) , ISCHANGED ( PS_Escalated_To_Name__c ) , ISCHANGED ( PS_Stakeholder__c ) , ISCHANGED ( Justification_for_Critical_Priority__c ), ISCHANGED ( Comment__c ) , ISCHANGED ( CH_InitialDiagnosis__c ) , ISCHANGED ( CH_SolutionDetails__c ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You can't edit a "Closed" Support Ticket.
